content: easy to crochet and quick to work up this wide twist front ear warmer headband is available in 6 different sizes crocheted with medium weight yarn 4 and a 5 5 mm i hook gauge approximately 15 row per 4 75 inches and 14 sts per 4 inches patterns available that use this same stitch and yarn are * whatever will be hat 1 * whatever will be scarf 2 the stitch multiple is 3+2 > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **youtube ** https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confirmation=1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2022 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2021-whatever-will-be-will-be-hat/ 2 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2021-whatever-will-be-will-be-scarf/
